programme.desc: Tugann Daisy agus Ollie cúnamh do Sonny agus é ag fáil faoi réir do chóisir Díbheálaí. (Daisy and Ollie offer to help Sonny prepare for the Diwali party.)

programme.title: Dot
programme.desc: Tagann Scratch ar bholb sa ngarraí. (Scratch finds a caterpillar in the garden.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Caitín óg ag imirt cispheile agus madra ag déanamh ióga a bheidh againn inniu. (On today's programme we have a kitten playing basketball and a dog doing yoga.)

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: Is é Seán Ó Riain as Corcaigh a bheidh ag comhrá le Máirtín Tom Sheáinín. (Seán Ó Riain from Cork is Máirtín Tom Sheáinín's guest on Comhrá.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Airíonn Kevin uaidh go mór comhluadar a chairde. (Kevin misses spending time with his friends.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Rinneadh taifeadadh ar an gclár seo in Bofey Quinn's i gCora Finne i gContae an Chláir. (This episode of Geantraí comes from Bofey Quinn's in Co. Clare. Presented Gary Shannon.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Cuireann Sophia a croí agus a hanam ina post ag eagrú caitheamh aimsire in áras do sheandaoine. (Sophia throws herself into her job as recreational director at a retirement home.)

programme.title: Murder She Wrote
programme.desc: Ciontaítear nia Jessica i gcalaois chánach & dúnmharú. (Jessica investigates when her nephew is charged with tax fraud & a murder.)

programme.title: Plean Bee
programme.desc: Léargas ar an meath atá tagtha ar líon na mbeach agus na bpailneoirí in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile le blianta anuas. (A look at the decline in bees and pollinators.)

programme.title: Taste of Australia with Hayden Quinn
programme.desc: Casann Hayden le feirmeoir óg a bhíonn ag fás prátaí milse sula dtugann sé aghaidh ar Magnetic Island. (Hayden is heading for the famous Magnetic Island.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre - Rogha & Togha
programme.desc: Beidh Trudi Lalor agus Patrick Connolly ar stáitse sa gclár seo. (Trudi Lalor and Patrick Connolly give a lively and entertaining performance on the show.)

programme.title: Escape from the City
programme.desc: Tá Simone ag ceapadh go mbeadh an saol níos fearr in Daylesford seachas in Melbourne. (Simone feels that a move to Daylesford is her escape from the rat-race of Melbourne.)
